meanings.sent1: The company plans to sextuple its profits by the end of the year.
meanings.sent2: She was surprised to see her savings account sextupling after investing wisely.
meanings.sent3: The garden gnome magically sextupled the number of flowers in the garden overnight.
meanings.sent4: His excitement about the upcoming vacation was sextupling with each passing day.
meanings.sent5: The population of the small town was sextupling due to the opening of a new factory.

meanings.definition: Six times as much or as many.
meanings.sent1: The family bought a sextupling amount of groceries for the week.
meanings.sent2: She was amazed by the sextupling number of stars visible in the clear night sky.
meanings.sent3: The oversized umbrella was perfect for providing shade for a sextupling number of people.
meanings.sent4: The old tree had a sextupling amount of branches, making it a favorite spot for birds.
meanings.sent5: The new library had a sextupling collection of books compared to the old one.
